# Celerity, Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 105

*You borrow a slice of time from the future, pulling it into the present so that you can act.*

Upon casting this spell, you can immediately take a move action. After performing this action, you are dazed until the end of your next turn.

**GM Note**

Especially powerful if cast while *[[Unfazed (Spell)|unfazed]]* or any of the *mind stasis* variants is in effect.
